alert.note: Alert for Benton; Buchanan; Delaware; Iowa; Johnson; Keokuk; Linn; Washington (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 1:23AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Buchanan, northern Keokuk, Johnson, Benton, northern Washington, western Delaware, Linn and Iowa Counties through 230 AM CDT... At 123 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Cedar Falls to near Dysart to near Montezuma. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Garrison around 130 AM CDT. Mount Auburn around 135 AM CDT. Vinton around 140 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Brandon, Ladora, Urbana, Fairbank, Marengo, Williamsburg, Center Point, Rowley, Conroy, Hazleton, Walker, Quasqueton, Stanley, Amana and Troy Mills. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Iowa between mile markers 205 and 248. Interstate 380 between mile markers 1 and 55. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Benton; Buchanan; Delaware; Iowa; Johnson; Keokuk; Linn; Washington
